title: ICE: non_lifetime_binders: `unexpected bound ty in binder`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] fn take(id: impl for Fn(T) -> T) {} fn main() { take(|x| x) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (39c6804b9 2023-04-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: 39c6804b92aa202369e402525cee329556bc1db0 commit-date: 2023-04-19 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` warning: the feature `non_lifetime_binders` is incomplete and may not be safe to use and/or cause compiler crashes --> treereduce.out:1:12 | 1 | #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: see issue #108185 for more information = note: `#[warn(incomplete_features)]` on by default error: internal compiler error: /rustc/39c6804b92aa202369e402525cee329556bc1db0/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/fold.rs:285:33: unexpected bound ty in binder: BoundTy { var: 0, kind: Anon } thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/39c6804b92aa202369e402525cee329556bc1db0/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1643:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f866c661d43 -
